item.description:
Find us on Facebook

 Eva 978-857-6626 I will Have Meet Up sign on the Table

 

The Ashworth is a great place to meet your friends, this place rocks Hampton Beach, my favorite place of all in the summer time. Great DJ, lots of dancing room, and Air Conditioning!!!! Whether yu come out for dinner or just to rock the night away come join in, you will def have FUN!!!! We will be in "Breakers Lounge".

 

Would be so great to see as many new faces as well as familiar faces, bring your boyfriends, girlfriends, hubbies or what ever floats your boat just come on down.

 

I will get us tables to the left of the bar closest to the dance floor. I plan to eat cause I love there fish dishes, any one want to join me get there early grab your table and have a couple toasts with me!!! They have great wine, beer, soda what ever you desire. There is no dress code what ever you feel comfy in.

 

Time 7- 1am

 

P.S. any one want to add them selves as an assist throw it in!!!! Just did not want to add ya in case ya have plans ;-)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Group with the Great Big Smiles,,and the only Boogy Group on the Planet!!!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Get off Your Tooshy and "PARTY LIKE U NEVER DID BEFORE"
